issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Movie and its snapshot get merged on device rotation. Also, the labels displayed are being overlapped by movie snapshot.
This is not regression.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Go to Kitchensink >Phone >Play Movie >Embedded Video.
2. Rotate device.

Actual:
The movie and its snapshot get merged and the info labels are being overlapped by the snapshot.

Expected:
On device rotation also, the movie and its snapshot should be separate and info labels should be visible enough to be read.
fields.summary: iOS: Play Movie - Movie and its snapshot get merged on device rotation.
fields.environment:
Tested with SDK: 2.1.0.v20120618154152
Tested with Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.0.201206172244
Device: iPhone 3GS (v 5.0.1)
OS: Mac OSX Version 10.7.3

comments.body:
Issue reproduces 

Tested with

Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.1.201212181159
Titanium SDK version: 3.1.0 
Titanium SDK version: 3.0.2 
iOS iPhone Simulator: iOS SDK version: 6.0
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
